title: Minister of Health and Population (Nepal) - Wikipedia
snippet: Sudha Sharma Gautam is the current Minister of Health and Population, assuming office from 26 October 2025.

title: Ministry of Health and Population (Nepal) - Wikipedia
snippet: Bikas Devkota currently holds the position of Secretary of the Ministry of Health and Population. Roshan Pokhrel formerly held the position of health secretary. The Department of Health Services serves under the ministry to facilitate and implement its work, mainly deliver health services and ...

title: Amid controversy, Karki expands Cabinet for third time
snippet: Gautam, who served as health secretary from 2008 to 2011, will lead the Ministry of Health and Population, and Gupta will head the Ministry of Youth and Sports.
